descriptionSet.description: On the back of this postcard, we see a of what is pictured in the front as well as address details of the publisher.

inscription.text: Art Series Ravi Draupadi on unpleasant errand. Draupadi purposely sent by Sudheshna to bring food and wine from her brother Kichak, who is lustful towards her, is reluctantly doing it. P.S. Joshi, Art Publisher, 182 Kalbadevi Rd., Bombay.

location.name: Delhi / The Priya Paul Collection of Popular Art
Delhi / The Priya Paul Collection of Popular Art

rights.text: Copyrighted. Copyright with the original artists and publishers.

hra:item.hra:value: text-en: Art Series Ravi Draupadi on unpleasant errand. Draupadi purposely sent by Sudheshna to bring food and wine from her brother Kichak, who is lustful towards her, is reluctantly doing it. P.S. Joshi, Art Publisher, 182 Kalbadevi Rd., Bombay.
description-en: On the back of this postcard, we see a description of what is pictured in the front as well as address details of the publisher. (gs)
